title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. VI, pt. 354 - Restoration To Membership Of Tier 3 And 4 Service Retirees Of The New York State And Local Employees' Retirement System
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. VI, pt. 354 - Restoration To Membership Of Tier 3 And 4 Service Retirees Of The New York State And Local Employees' Retirement System

State Regulations
§ 354.1 - Background
§ 354.2 - Individuals covered by this part
§ 354.3 - Restoration to membership
§ 354.4 - Coverage under retirement option elected
§ 354.5 - Reinstatement of tier status upon restoration
§ 354.6 - Calculation of benefits for restored members
§ 354.7 - Computation of benefits for restored tier 3 and tier 4 members who retire with an outstanding loan balance

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. VI, pt. 354

Statutory authority: Retirement and Social Security Law, §§101, 517-c, 519, 613-b, 614

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
